website_summaries.verdict: Clear case with rubber bumpers and edges that provides a sleek look.
pros: Clear case allows you to show off the sharp-looking S8 smartphone
Rubber bumpers and edges provide equal measures of protection and grip
Rubber edges are available in 3 colors: black, blue, or white, which is a nice difference from other cases
cons: Any smudges or dirt will be clearly visible

customer_reviews.title: An excellent fit and a fantastic value for the money for an attractive S8 case.
customer_reviews.text: The MoKo case is soft and flexible; it's a breeze to insert the phone into it. Once on, the first impression you get is that the case is very slim and very light. It's almost transparent, and that adds to the impression that the case is not at all intrusive. All the buttons on the phone align perfectly with the case, and the slot for charger access is perfectly placed. The closest thing to a criticism that I could offer is that the back of the case is not textured in any way, and since it is slick plastic it can be a bit slippery in the hands -- so get a decent grip on it.
customer_reviews.author: Paul H Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Very protective
customer_reviews.text: I bought this with my new phone 2 years ago and needed to replace it recently (yes, it will wear after 2 years). I have dropped my phone face down or on the edge multiple times and never cracked my screen with this cover. It's transparent, so doesn't detract from the phone color or design. Very hard wearing and reasonably priced compared to other phone cases.
customer_reviews.author: V. Owen

customer_reviews.title: Love this case for the Galaxy S8
customer_reviews.text: Love this case for the curved edge of the Galaxy S8. It protects the phone without detracting from the beauty and design of the phone. It has slightly raised bumpers on all 4 corners of both the front and back of the case so that you can set your phone down either face up or face down without risking damaging the screen.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl A. Atchison

customer_reviews.title: I bought this case based on the reviews and product ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this case based on the reviews and product description online. Within one week of having, I dropped my phone, from less than 3 feet, while sitting, and the screen cracked to the point that small pieces of the screen came out. I had to spend $236 dollars to replace this screen. Even more frustrating, I cannot return this item. Stick with other dropped tested cases if you don't want to have issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The MoKo is exactly what I was looking for as it is not big and bulky and came in my favorite color.
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased a samsung galaxy S8 and needed a caae to protect it. The MoKo is exactly what I was looking for as it is not big and bulky and came in my favorite color...blue. For some reason I have been dropping my brand new phone all over the place since I got my MoKo case (not on purpose) and this case has been a life saver. I highly recommend this case to protect your phone. I've dropped my phone enough times with this case to know it's good.
customer_reviews.author: Mdot

customer_reviews.title: Charger does not fit and no refunds.
customer_reviews.text: Received this item and was pleased with the product however, can not charge my phone as the plug does not fit in properly. Tried to get refund but says no refunds after order was received. Had I know this I would never had purchased it. Very upset and not good customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Daniella Pascale

customer_reviews.title: Slim and flexible case.  Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Have had this installed for the past three months. It has not yellowed or gotten hard. Overall a great case. I've dropped the phone a few times from a meter up and the phone hasn't broke and the case barely has a scratch.
customer_reviews.author: Joe S

customer_reviews.title: Great case. Fits snugly and exactly right on my ...
customer_reviews.text: Great case. Fits snugly and exactly right on my S8 Galaxy. I especially like the extra cutouts for the bottom ports & speaker. It allows the sound to come out much better and I think people hear me better than my previous case as well.
customer_reviews.author: Rexen

customer_reviews.title: Used a similar brand for my LG G5 phone. ...
customer_reviews.text: Used a similar brand for my LG G5 phone. No real complaints, except I need to make sure my charger is connected when I have the case on. Sometimes it'll stay hooked as if it is charging but it was not. Overall no big issues!
customer_reviews.author: Mai Tai

customer_reviews.title: Very good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This phone protector measures up to a lot of the high priced brands. I have dropped my phone a few times, but not a scratch on my S8. If you need something sturdy to protect your phone, this product will not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby P.

customer_reviews.title: Good S8 Case
customer_reviews.text: Makes S8 less slippery. Important in our household as our cat enjoys sliding items off tables. Otherwise unobtrusive, not bulky. Hope not to test the prevention of breakage.
customer_reviews.author: Diane P.

customer_reviews.title: Great phone case
customer_reviews.text: Great phone case and works well with wireless charging!! The corners of the phone are well protected and the bevel of the screen is still visible.
customer_reviews.author: alex176

customer_reviews.title: Protects phone, looks nice
customer_reviews.text: I like that I can slip a photo in between the phone and the case to have visible from the outside.
customer_reviews.author: Echo

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit!  Sturdy! Attractive
customer_reviews.text: I really like this case it is sleek...attractive...and does a great job protecting my new Galaxy S8. Reasonably priced too.
customer_reviews.author: Randall G. Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Excellent gel case; soft and flexible, absorbs shocks, all holes align, bumper protection for screen.
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfects, all openings align, soft and flexible, similar quality to Ballistic.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Dowell

customer_reviews.title: Kind of worth it
customer_reviews.text: I only got this because I needed a case fast but the only problem I have with it is that the case collects dust and you can see it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This case is awesome. Fits perfectly and gets compliments everywhere I go. Really makes my phone look great and provides extra grip to prevent slipping. Get this one you guys.
customer_reviews.author: LB83

customer_reviews.title: I would definitely buy this again.
customer_reviews.text: Very attractive and slimmer than a lot of cases. Great protection for phone without looking clunky.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen D.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Fits great. Buttons work better than with the Otter box I just replaced. Apparently better quality than Otterbox.
customer_reviews.author: David L

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Easy to put on, fits my S8 perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: J. Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Good case
customer_reviews.text: Nice case. Crystal clear, buttons work easily, good grip-ability. Like the raised bumpers for better protection but still slides easily into pocket or purse. Wd buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Topcat

customer_reviews.title: has been great. Buttons work fine and it seems very protective
customer_reviews.text: This case, so far, has been great. Buttons work fine and it seems very protective. Previous similar cases, however, have started to split at the seams within a couple of months of use. This one seems fine so far but i am waiting to see if that happens to this one too
customer_reviews.author: Anne Frye

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I like the case a lot. It's clear so I can see all the cool stuff my Galaxy S8 does. I wish it were a little more sticky though to deter sliding.
customer_reviews.author: MyPointOfView

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Phone screen cracked the first time being dropped in this case from about waist height.
customer_reviews.author: Renate

customer_reviews.title: As described for 8+
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Slim, yet sturdy. So far, I really like it!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: This is a great looking case
customer_reviews.text: This is a great looking case. Its not too bulky, and the screen gets decent protection from the lips that come out a bit. I'd recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kiran M

customer_reviews.title: Alright
customer_reviews.text: It's okay it feels a bit cheap but it does cover the phone well.
customer_reviews.author: David Staneart

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing case. Fits perfect, does not gwt in way of screen yet protects it
customer_reviews.author: Jose Martinez

customer_reviews.title: It is a nice case but it feels a little insecure for me ...
customer_reviews.text: It is a nice case but it feels a little insecure for me when I put it on the phone. It feels slippery when you hold the phone and it feels like it is not going to protect the phone in case it falls.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A very nice case. Cant beat the price
customer_reviews.text: A very nice case. Cant beat the price. It may be a bit slippery so i plan to get some adhesive silicon ring on the back side
customer_reviews.author: phong

customer_reviews.title: Nice case
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a great case. Only have used it for a week, but fit will and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great case!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this case. Protects your phone without being bulky. Case isn't slippery and keeps phone protected if it falls face down.
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: This case fits the Galaxy S8 perfectly. It has just the right amount of grip to keep the phone from slipping out of your hand. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: PSS

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. It is a tad slick
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. It is a tad slick, but I do like the design and it is snug fit but does not impede charging or use.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory C. Schuler

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, easy to put on and take off, and not bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Lee

customer_reviews.title: Works great with the Galaxy 8 phone
customer_reviews.text: Came quickly and exactly as advertised. Works great with the Galaxy 8 phone, fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: susan wence

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great cover looks perfect and replaced the one that cracked...
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel Simkin

customer_reviews.title: My s8 fell so many times and it seems like nothing happened
customer_reviews.text: Works well. My s8 fell so many times and it seems like nothing happened.
customer_reviews.author: Nicco Alegro

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I am satisfied with the product. It was what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, clear case with strong protection
customer_reviews.text: Fits very well with tempered glass. Sturdy, clear case with strong protection.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Pena

customer_reviews.title: 100% Should Buy
customer_reviews.text: A Amazing case fits perfect with any glass protectors and really good looking.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Portugal

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Nice simple case and slim. I like it. The only drawback is that it's warped or something so when I have my phone on a flat surface the top corner isn't level so when I click on the top it moves. Similar to a table at a restaurant that moves when you put your elbow on or off the table. Not sure if it's a manufacturing thing or what. So it's a little annoying but otherwise a great case. It's good for the charges that you lay the device on for a charge as it's thin enough to transmit and charge.
customer_reviews.author: G. Raines

customer_reviews.title: Most protective case for the curved screen
customer_reviews.text: Out of the 8 cases I ordered to try out, this is the one I kept. When I put it face down it had twice the amount of space between the table and screen than with the other models like caseology, spigken, and all of the other clear cases. Get the belt holster that comes with the Encased case, it fits perfectly & the IQ Shield screen protector doesn't affect the edge of the screen at all like other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Fits beautifully, and looks great
customer_reviews.text: Fits beautifully, and looks great. I really like the clear case, but the softer TPU cases stick to the back of my phone, and I don't like the look. Because the back of the MoKo case is a harder plastic, it doesn't stick. I like the exaggerated bumpers at the top and bottom; they make me feel more secure in the event that I drop my phone. Experience: I've had two drops, from about 5 feet each time, onto concrete, and my phone survived unscathed both times. I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jerome A. Grossman

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Case
customer_reviews.text: I love the way my phone looks in this case. It's a great fit and it seems durable. I'll come back and give an update when I've had it longer since I just got it today UPDATE: The case has turned a brownish type color. It is still doing its job though. I have dropped my phone so many times and it hasn't cracked at all.
customer_reviews.author: meshia1

customer_reviews.title: Auc cable cutout too small
customer_reviews.text: I like this case, and bought this case, because it is minimalist. I wanted something where my phone could show through. The only problem I've got with it is that the cut out for the aux cable is not big enough for the aux cable in my car. I used a number of cutting tools at the house to make the hole big enough for the aux cable. Note: all my aux cables work with the old cutout except for one that apparently has a bigger handle than the others.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Love how when I place my new phone face down ...
customer_reviews.text: Love how when I place my new phone face down it doesn't touch the screen. perfect fit and material love it!
customer_reviews.author: nery

customer_reviews.title: Careful of scratches on the back!
customer_reviews.text: This case is not bad, it provides good front and back protection. As a stylish person...I don't recommend this as it is clear so scratch marks will appear. It's not too bulky but also not too thin; i dropped my phone a few time and no scratches or cracks. I do have a glass screen protector so i don't know how it would work on a non-protected screen.
customer_reviews.author: Mei Wu

customer_reviews.title: Easy install, fits nicely without adding much extra size to phone
customer_reviews.text: Fit my Galaxy S8 well without adding additional bulk to phone. Item was just as described. Very easy installation: put one end of phone in case, then "stretch" other end of case over opposite end of phone. Works fine with my screen protector. I haven't had any drops more than a couple of inches yet, but will update my review if there are any issues. Would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Elegant and sleek
customer_reviews.text: Love its design and the elegance of it. Sadly as with almost all clear cases, they get greasy and need to be wiped constantly. Worse if you have kids. But, this case is awesome. Super clear, super easy to hold, great looks.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: I love this case. I've dropped my phone a few times from 4ft or higher and it's done its job. Also since it's clear I can but stuff that scans like my gym membership tag behind it and not worry about forgetting it. Great value for the price. Would purchase again for future phones.
customer_reviews.author: jessie Sosa

customer_reviews.title: Best case ever.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased for my galaxy s8 and it does not disappoint. The front-facing, raised edges are key to no scratches when setting it down. All corners are protected. For all the cases I have owned, this one has proved best.
customer_reviews.author: Alli

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Perfect snug fit, nice and grippy, offers good drop protection.
customer_reviews.author: Ju W.

customer_reviews.title: Love this case
customer_reviews.text: Love this case. Easy to handle, yet provides the protection I need with bumpers that prevent the screen from ever touching a surface as well as protection on the exterior buttons. Like the clear case. Why buy a nice phone just to hide it?
customer_reviews.author: Wildcat

customer_reviews.title: Great design and value
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value. Dropped phone twice already and not a scratch. Forget the other high priced ones, this is it. It's quite slim too.
customer_reviews.author: Arackman

customer_reviews.title: Terrific case
customer_reviews.text: This is a great case that provides great protection for my phone. I have dropped it several times and my phone remained undamaged.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne G. Houston

customer_reviews.title: Very nice clear case!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice clear case. Covers edges on phone. Gave it 4 starts only because the black lining looks more navy blue than black.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and look
customer_reviews.text: Love this case. Replaced a Caseology case that yellowed and felt weird in my hand. This case fits well, feels good and is perfect. Happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sue M

customer_reviews.title: New Phone Needs a New Protection Case
customer_reviews.text: New Phone New Case! love it, keeps it all secure and see through
customer_reviews.author: Mike Harrigan

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone Case
customer_reviews.text: These are excellent cases. Slim, light weight, but yet protect the phone. A perfect fit, as well.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne Wakefield

customer_reviews.title: Feels, looks and fits awesome
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly and all buttons and ports are freely accesible. Extra protection on corners seems like a plus. We own 2 of these and so far satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A little thicker than I'd like which makes it hard to use the on/off button
customer_reviews.text: Works ok. A little thicker than I'd like which makes it hard to use the on/off button. It seems to protect the phone well enough.
customer_reviews.author: alleycat

customer_reviews.title: Great case
customer_reviews.text: (*UPDATE* Dropped my phone on concrete today and it didn't break. Pretty impressed with the durability of the case. )This is a great case. It is well made and sturdy. I do feel confident that it will protect my phone if I drop it. It fit perfectly and was easy to put on. Great buy and value.
customer_reviews.author: carolyn pierce

customer_reviews.title: Fits nice and slim profile
customer_reviews.text: Fits and looks great. Have no idea yet how well it can protect the phone until I drop it
customer_reviews.author: Roger E. Ervast

customer_reviews.title: has good grip, and is nice looking
customer_reviews.text: The case fits well, has good grip, and is nice looking. I wish it were thinner though. It seems thicker than it really needs to be, particularly at the bottom edge where it makes plugging in the adapters impossible.
customer_reviews.author: CT Phan

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Minimalist case. Fits perfectly. Extended bumpers on four corners. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: M G

customer_reviews.title: It's a great case. Easy to charge and get to buttons
customer_reviews.text: It's a great case. Easy to charge and get to buttons.
customer_reviews.author: JAMES WILLIS

customer_reviews.title: Buy this case
customer_reviews.text: I feel like I have a new phone. This case is so much better than the last one I bought with my phone (for way too much money) It shows off the beautiful colors of my phone and fits wonderfully without adding too much bulk - and I have small hands.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice and functional
customer_reviews.text: I like that the case is clear and has these edges with bumpers. Feels like it's going to be a good protection.
customer_reviews.author: Pandalover

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This looks very nice. And has very great drop protection.
customer_reviews.author: Kaleb

customer_reviews.title: Great looking case with good protection
customer_reviews.text: Got this case couple of days back and its really good. Has a notch on all the corners so that phone is protected in the case of a fall and phone looks great with this case.
customer_reviews.author: Sri

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: My orde was puntual.. and the case adjust with my phone perfectly! I like it!
customer_reviews.author: Daniela S.

customer_reviews.title: I think that proves how strong and sturdy this case is
customer_reviews.text: Well I threw this at the wall for a test and the wall broke. I think that proves how strong and sturdy this case is. Sometimes made in China works!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Galaxy S8 Case, MoKo Crystal Clear TPU Bumper Gel Case Shockproof TPE Edge + Rigid PC Hard Back Cover for Samsung Galaxy S8 5.8 Inch (2017) - Blue
product_meta.description:
Color:BlueMoKo Premium Protective Clear Case For Samsung Galaxy S8, You're Worth It. 

Transparent Slim Design 
Provides crystal clear vision of your phone's original look and style. Lightweight design allows for minimal bulk in your bag or pocket.

High-grade Material 
Dynamic combination of anti-scratch polycarbonate + shock absorbent TPU + flexible TPE materials for reinforced toughness.

Raised Bezel Protection 
Raised lips shield your phone camera and touchscreen from unnecessary scratches by lifting off flat surface when placed face down. 

TPU Bumper Cushion 
Bumper cushion around 4 corners offer shockproof protection from the impact of accidental falls or drops. No longer need to worry about damage to your phone. 

About MoKo 
MoKo is a top-rated brand on Amazon and a registered Trademark of BSCstore. 
We provide best quality products and stand behind them with satisfaction offerd and easy-to-reach customer service.
feature_bullets: ✦ Extra Protection - Colored flexible rubber inner frame provides extra cushion for shock-absorption and crush resistance to safeguard the phone.
✦ Sturdy Structure - TPU bumper border with 4 raised corners + rigid PC clear back panel offer full protection around the device.
✦ Considerate Design - Elevated bezels and corners keep the screen and camera from scratching or touching the ground.
✦ Precise Cutouts - Precise cutouts give full access to ports, speakers and camera; tactile buttons provide you with an original responsive control.
✦ Minimalist Style - Minimalism at its best. Crystal clear back cover perfectly fit your phone. Easy snap-on installation and quick removal without scuff.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars38 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
